options.content: This dashboard requires ZapiPerf Collector. It is not currently available via RestPerf.

panels.description: Average IO processing latency for screen request.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Policy by IO Processing Latency

panels.description: Average IO thread wait latency for the screen request.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Policy by IO Thread Wait Latency

panels.description: Average policy processing latency for screen request.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Policy by Processing Latency

panels.description: Number of screen requests for which deny is received from fpolicy server.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Policy by Denied Requests

panels.description: Number of screen requests went through fpolicy processing.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Policy by Processed Requests

panels.description: Average IO processing latency for screen request.
panels.title: Top $TopResources SVM by IO Processing Latency

panels.description: Average IO thread wait latency for screen request.
panels.title: Top $TopResources SVM by IO Thread Wait Latency

panels.description: Number of cifs screen requests sent to fpolicy server.
panels.title: Top $TopResources SVM by Cifs Requests

panels.description: Number of failed file operation notifications sent to fpolicy server.
panels.title: Top $TopResources SVM by Failed File Operation

panels.description: Maximum latency for a screen request.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Servers by Max Request Latency

panels.description: Number of screen requests whose processing was cancelled (cancel timeout).
panels.title: Top $TopResources Servers by Cancelled Requests

panels.description: Number of screen requests the node failed to send to fpolicy server.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Servers by Failed Requests

panels.description: Total number of screen requests waiting for response.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Servers by Outstanding Requests

panels.description: Total number of screen requests processed(sync and async).
panels.title: Top $TopResources Servers by Processed Requests
